title: black screen after champion select
body:
My mac goes into a black screen after champion select and then with the pop up about the firewall, but my firewall is turned off. This has been going on for 2 days and it's still like this. Help..

I've tried all the methods that I've found on threads:
-deleting the release file after copying the file in it
-reinstalling
-repairs
-DNS changes

I don't know what else to do now ):

replies.body:
Check out [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#section-mac) and try out everything there. You've already tried some of it so you can probably just skip over it. Also make sure that it's not a combination of things (like both your DNS stuffing up and your VPN blocking it).

If you need any help with it, just ask.

One last thing, who's your ISP?
